# vngcloud_vserver_flavor (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
data "vngcloud_vserver_flavor" "flavor" {
    name = "dev.v1.small1x1"
    project_id = "pro-462803f3-6858-466f-bf05-df2b33faa360"
    flavor_zone_id =  "9BEC387B-0DC1-41D1-B177-5FDC72ED7B0C"
}
```
